verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
(Peace of God,
peace of God forever
be with you). x2
Come to Jesus
the prince of peace,
peace of God forever
be with you.
He's our Saviour and redeemer,
peace of God forever
be with you.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
(Love of God,
love of God forever
be with you). x2
Come to Jesus
the prince of peace,
love of God forever
be with you.
He's our Saviour and redeemer,
love of God forever
be with you.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
(Joy of God,
joy of God forever
be with you). x2
Come to Jesus the
prince of peace,
joy of God forever
be with you.
He's our Saviour and redeemer,
joy of God forever
be with you.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
(Faith of God,
faith of God forever
be with you). x2
Come to Jesus
the prince of peace,
faith of God forever
be with you.
He's our Saviour and redeemer,
faith of God forever
be with you.
